name: classify
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool iab_taxonomy_text_classification.
Tool description: Most accurate IAB v2 Taxonomy Text Classification, Economical Pricing, Best in class Infrastructure
API description: Classifies input text using the IAB taxonomy via RapidAPI and returns the confidence score and IAB classification.

text.description: The input text to be classified.
text.default: Bank of Americate all your financial and banking requirements satisfied here.
